gremlin:AggressiveDefense.NAME: Aggressive Defense
gremlin:AggressiveDefense.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you gain Block this turn, targeted enemy loses !M! HP.

gremlin:Astound.NAME: Astound
gremlin:Astound.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you have 3 or more Wiz, add !M! Wards to your hand.
gremlin:Astound.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you have 3 or more Wiz, add !M! Upgraded Wards to your hand.

gremlin:Bang.NAME: Bang
gremlin:Bang.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. Add 1 copy of Whiz to your discard pile. NL Exhaust.
gremlin:Bang.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. Add 1 Upgraded copy of Whiz to your discard pile. NL Exhaust.

gremlin:Bellow.NAME: Bellow
gremlin:Bellow.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !M! Strength for each enemy that does not intend to Attack. NL Exhaust.

gremlin:BrokenShin.NAME: Broken Shin
gremlin:BrokenShin.DESCRIPTION: Apply Agony for every !M! stacks of Weak the target has.

gremlin:BubbleBarrier.NAME: Bubble Barrier
gremlin:BubbleBarrier.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card this turn, gain !M! Block.

gremlin:BulkUp.NAME: Bulk Up
gremlin:BulkUp.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Temporary HP. NL Swap to Fat_Gremlin.

gremlin:BurlyBlow.NAME: Burly Blow
gremlin:BurlyBlow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each stack of Weakened. NL (Always hits at least once.)

gremlin:CongaLine.NAME: Conga Line
gremlin:CongaLine.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain [E] and Swap to the next Gremlin.
gremlin:CongaLine.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, gain [E] and Swap to the next Gremlin.

gremlin:CounterStrike.NAME: Counter Strike
gremlin:CounterStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the enemy intends to attack, add !M! Wards to your hand.
gremlin:CounterStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the enemy intends to attack, add !M! Upgraded Wards to your hand.

gremlin:CowerChoiceB.NAME: Cower
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Good. Now the rest of you, scram!

gremlin:DaggerDance.NAME: Dagger Dance
gremlin:DaggerDance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !M! times.

gremlin:Dazzle.NAME: Dazzle
gremlin:Dazzle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have 3 or more gremlin:Wiz, gremlin:Steal 2 Strength. NL Exhaust.

gremlin:Duplicate.NAME: Duplicate
gremlin:Duplicate.DESCRIPTION: Make !M! Echoes of an Attack in your hand. They cost 1 less. Exhaust.
gremlin:Duplicate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Make !M! Echoes of an Attack in your hand. They cost 1 less.

gremlin:EdibleArmor.NAME: Edible Armor
gremlin:EdibleArmor.DESCRIPTION: Convert your Block into Temporary HP.

gremlin:Encore.NAME: Encore
gremlin:Encore.DESCRIPTION: Gain 3 Wiz. NL Whenever you consume Wiz, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

gremlin:Enthusiasm.NAME: Enthusiasm
gremlin:Enthusiasm.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Swap, draw a card.

gremlin:Exacerbate.NAME: Exacerbate
gremlin:Exacerbate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Cripple the enemy. NL Exhaust.

gremlin:FairyDust.NAME: Fairy Dust
gremlin:FairyDust.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! Wards to your hand and draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

gremlin:SleeveOfAces.NAME: Sleeve Of Aces
gremlin:SleeveOfAces.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add 1 Shiv to your hand for each stack of Wiz you have.
gremlin:SleeveOfAces.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add 1 Upgraded Shiv to your hand for each stack of Wiz you have.

gremlin:FeelTheAudience.NAME: Feel The Audience
gremlin:FeelTheAudience.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain !M! Wiz for each one that intends to attack.

gremlin:FightChoice.NAME: Fight
gremlin:FightChoice.DESCRIPTION: Start Combat. NL Enemy gains !M! Strength.

gremlin:FlipOut.NAME: Flip Out
gremlin:FlipOut.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Whenever you would gain Block this turn, instead deal that much damage to ALL enemies.

gremlin:Flurry.NAME: Flurry
gremlin:Flurry.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each card played this turn. NL Exhaust.

gremlin:FollowThrough.NAME: For The Leader!
gremlin:FollowThrough.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Temporary Strength.

gremlin:Fury.NAME: Fury
gremlin:Fury.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less [E] for each 2 Strength you have. NL Deal !D! damage thrice.

gremlin:Glimmer.NAME: Glimmer
gremlin:Glimmer.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add 2 Wards to your hand.
gremlin:Glimmer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add 2 Upgraded Wards to your hand.

gremlin:GlitterGuard.NAME: Glitter Guard
gremlin:GlitterGuard.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! Wards to your hand. NL Swap to Shield_Gremlin.
gremlin:GlitterGuard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add !M! Upgraded Wards to your hand. NL Swap to Shield_Gremlin.

gremlin:GremlinArms.NAME: Gremlin Arms
gremlin:GremlinArms.DESCRIPTION: Add a random assortment of !M! Shivs and Wards to your hand.

gremlin:GremlinDance.NAME: Gremlin Dance
gremlin:GremlinDance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Has a bonus effect based on which Gremlin you are.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: . NL Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn.
. NL This attack does not consume Wiz.

gremlin:GremlinOffensive.NAME: Gremlin Offensive
gremlin:GremlinOffensive.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a Gremlin Offensive to your hand. NL Exhaust.
gremlin:GremlinOffensive.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add an Upgraded Gremlin Offensive to your hand. NL Exhaust.

gremlin:GremlinToss.NAME: Gremlin Toss
gremlin:GremlinToss.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your current Block and Temporary HP.
gremlin:GremlinToss.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Temporary HP. NL Deal damage equal to your current Block and Temporary HP.

gremlin:Heckle.NAME: Heckle
gremlin:Heckle.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply a debuff to an enemy, gain !M! Temporary HP.

gremlin:InfiniteBlocks.NAME: Infinite Blocks
gremlin:InfiniteBlocks.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a Ward to your hand.
gremlin:InfiniteBlocks.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, add a Ward to your hand.

gremlin:IrksomeBlow.NAME: Irksome Blow
gremlin:IrksomeBlow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Irksome Blow is affected by Strength !M! times.

gremlin:Irritability.NAME: Irritability
gremlin:Irritability.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! temporary Thorns. NL Swap to Mad_Gremlin.

gremlin:Jeer.NAME: Jeer
gremlin:Jeer.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the enemy has a debuff, gain !M! Temporary HP.

gremlin:Kablamo.NAME: Kablamo!
gremlin:Kablamo.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL This attack does not consume Wiz.

gremlin:MakeshiftArmor.NAME: Makeshift Armor
gremlin:MakeshiftArmor.DESCRIPTION: Every time you play 7 attacks, gain 1 Artifact.
gremlin:MakeshiftArmor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Artifact. NL Every time you play 7 attacks, gain 1 Artifact.

gremlin:Mockery.NAME: Mockery
gremlin:Mockery.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL If the enemy has 3 or more Weak, gain !B! Block.

gremlin:Necromancy.NAME: Necromancy
gremlin:Necromancy.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if you have 5 or more Wiz. NL Consume all Wiz to resurrect a random Gremlin with !M! HP. Exhaust.

gremlin:Nob.NAME: NOB
gremlin:Nob.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Temporary HP. NL Mutate into Gremlin Nob until you run out of Temporary HP.

gremlin:PartyStick.NAME: Party Stick
gremlin:PartyStick.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Whenever you Swap while this card is in your hand, gain [E]
gremlin:PartyStick.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Whenever you Swap while this card is in your hand, gain [E] [E]
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Nobody is allowed to play with the Party Stick.

gremlin:Patsy.NAME: Patsy
gremlin:Patsy.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Swap to the next Gremlin.

gremlin:Pickpocket.NAME: Pickpocket
gremlin:Pickpocket.DESCRIPTION: gremlin:Steal all Artifact. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

gremlin:PinNeedle.NAME: Pin Needle
gremlin:PinNeedle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Insert !M! Pinpricks. NL Exhaust.
gremlin:PinNeedle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Insert !M! Upgraded Pinpricks. NL Exhaust.

gremlin:Pinprick.NAME: Pinprick
gremlin:Pinprick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw a card. NL Exhaust.
gremlin:Pinprick.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw this card, add an Echo of it to your hand. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Draw a card. NL Exhaust.

gremlin:Polish.NAME: Polish
gremlin:Polish.DESCRIPTION: Shivs deal !M! additional damage. NL Wards grant !M! additional Block.

gremlin:PourSalt.NAME: Pour Salt
gremlin:PourSalt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the enemy is Weak, add !M! Shivs to your hand.

gremlin:Pretaliation.NAME: Pretaliation
gremlin:Pretaliation.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage if the enemy intends to attack. NL Do !blamage! damage otherwise.

gremlin:ProperTools.NAME: Proper Tools
gremlin:ProperTools.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the enemy intends to attack, add !M! Wards to your hand. Otherwise, add !M! Shivs to your hand.

gremlin:Raid.NAME: Raid
gremlin:Raid.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card for each living Gremlin. NL Discard !M! cards.
gremlin:Raid.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw a card for each living Gremlin. NL Discard !M! card.

gremlin:Rhythm.NAME: Rhythm
gremlin:Rhythm.DESCRIPTION: Swap to the next Gremlin. NL Fetch a Basic card from your draw pile. It costs 0 this turn.

gremlin:Rush.NAME: Rush
gremlin:Rush.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

gremlin:Scatter.NAME: Scatter!
gremlin:Scatter.DESCRIPTION: The next time you would lose HP, instead Swap into a random Gremlin. NL Exhaust

gremlin:SecondVolley.NAME: Second Volley
gremlin:SecondVolley.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Add a Shiv to your hand for each card played this turn
gremlin:SecondVolley.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Add an upgraded Shiv to your hand for each card played this turn

gremlin:ShadowShiv.NAME: Shadow Shiv
gremlin:ShadowShiv.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an Attack that doesn't exhaust, add a Shiv to your hand.

gremlin:ShankStone.NAME: Shank Stone
gremlin:ShankStone.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Whenever you draw this card, add !M! Shivs to your hand.

gremlin:SharpenBlades.NAME: Sharpen Blades
gremlin:SharpenBlades.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the cost of all Attacks in your hand to 0 this turn.
gremlin:SharpenBlades.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. NL Reduce the cost of all Attacks in your hand to 0 this turn.

gremlin:ShowOfHands.NAME: Show of Hands
gremlin:ShowOfHands.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block for every card in your hand.
gremlin:ShowOfHands.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. NL Gain !M! Block for every card in your hand.

gremlin:ShowStopper.NAME: Show Stopper
gremlin:ShowStopper.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if you have exactly 10 Wiz. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies 5 times.

gremlin:SkullBash.NAME: Skull Bash
gremlin:SkullBash.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

gremlin:Stupend.NAME: Stupend
gremlin:Stupend.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Block is affected by Wiz.

gremlin:Tadah.NAME: Tadah!
gremlin:Tadah.DESCRIPTION: Add an Echo of a random Skill to your hand. NL Swap to Gremlin_Wizard.
gremlin:Tadah.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add an Echo of a random Skill to your hand. It costs 1 less. NL Swap to Gremlin_Wizard.

gremlin:TagTeam.NAME: Tag Team
gremlin:TagTeam.DESCRIPTION: Swap to a living Gremlin of your choice.
gremlin:TagTeam.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Swap to a living Gremlin of your choice.

gremlin:TargetWeakness.NAME: Target Wounds
gremlin:TargetWeakness.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! additional damage to Weakened enemies.

gremlin:Tricksy.NAME: Tricksy
gremlin:Tricksy.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. Discard all cards draw this way that are not Attacks. NL Swap to Sneaky_Gremlin.

gremlin:TwistTheKnife.NAME: Twist The Knife
gremlin:TwistTheKnife.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add 1 Shiv to your hand.
gremlin:TwistTheKnife.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add 1 Upgraded Shiv to your hand.

gremlin:ToeStub.NAME: Toe Stub
gremlin:ToeStub.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the enemy is Weak, apply !M! Vulnerable.

gremlin:Whiz.NAME: Whiz
gremlin:Whiz.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Wiz. Next turn, add 1 Bang to your hand. NL Exhaust.
gremlin:Whiz.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Wiz. Next turn, add 1 Upgraded Bang to your hand. NL Exhaust.

gremlin:Wizardry.NAME: Wizardry
gremlin:Wizardry.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! Wiz.
gremlin:Wizardry.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, gain !M! Wiz.
